name: The Memory Club
description:
In this hidden objects game developed in one week by two game design students, you will have to find the personal items that the character that you embody has lost during the crazy night that he just lived. Look carefully, your items are probably not where you think there are.
All the game elements are coming from pictures that was mainly taken in Berlin.
